revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = HP MediaVault MV2120 01.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = HP MV2120 Media Vault |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = https://support.hp.com/us-en/product/HP-Media-Vault-series/3193056/model/3660803 |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = HP |model = Media Vault |submodelappend = yes |submodel = MV2120 |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = NAS |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88F5182; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARMv5 |cpu1_type_rev = Feroceon core |cpu1spd = 500 <!-- 400 / 500 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX29LV400CTTC-70G; |flash1size = 512 KiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = SK hynix;HY5PS121621CFP-Y5; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;MV88E1118;MV88E1118-NNC1; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:0A:E4
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;1.1.4;Marvell 2.3.11;HP 1_3_1; |stockos = Linux;2.6.12.6-arm1;LSP Version 2.2.2_HP_1_1;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, SATA |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = 2 |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 18.5 |pwr_amp_dc = 3.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 10-pin header,, (115200 8N1),, CN4 |jtag = yes,, 20-pin header,, unpopulated
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = RTC w/ battery backup, |addchip = CMOS Real Time Clock;NXP;PCF8563;;1;,,, Dual Step-Down Switch-Mode Power Supply Controller;Maxim;MAX8744E;;1;,,, 4A, 26V, 380kHz Asynchronous Step-Down Converter;ANPEC;APW7080;;2;,,, 1A Low Dropout Positive Voltage Regulator;ANPEC;APL1117;;2;,,, 1MHz, 3A Peak Current-Limit Step-Down Regulator;Marvell;MVPG31;;2;,,, 1MHz, 7.5A Peak Current-Limit Step-Down Regulator;Marvell;88PG877;;1;,,, 30V N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha&Omega Semiconductor;AO4468;;2;,,, 30V N-Channel Enhancement Mode FET;Alpha&Omega Semiconductor;AO4422;;1;,,, 30V P-Channel Enhancement Mode FET;Alpha&Omega Semiconductor;AO4433;;1;,,, Hex Buffer and Driver With Open-Drain Outputs;Texas Instruments;SN74LVC07A;;1;,,, Dual Positive-Edge-Triggered D-Type Flip-Flop;Texas Instruments;SN74AHC74;;1;,,, 12-Bit to 24-Bit Multiplexed D-Type Latch w/ 3-State Outputs;Texas Instruments;SN74ALVCH162260;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Debian
|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 03/2008 |estprice = 299.99 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "P-D2 M/B", "06292-1" and "48.61N01.011" are silkscreened on the board.
